entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: President Trump and First Lady Melania visit the Taj Mahal
entity.description: The US president began his first two-day India visit in Ahmedabad where he joined Prime Minister Narendra Modi in opening the world's biggest cricket stadium. He is accompanied by First Lady Melania, daughter Ivanka and son-in-law Jared Kushner. The president then flew to Uttar Pradesh to visit the iconic Taj Mahal at sunset.

text: @realDonaldTrump Why don't you address the coronavirus and why you cut the CDC budget. And then tell us how you are making the stock market practically collapse. After all you are God and control all. Also, let us know why you took Ivanka and Jared to India, for her business. You're a JOKE
